notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Publication of the article was financed by the Polish National Agency for Academic Exchange under the Foreign Promotion Programme (NAWA), for A.A.P. (bee-research.umcs.pl; Api Lab UMCS PPI/PZA/2019/1/00039). This work was partially supported by the Nicolaus Copernicus University under the programme The Polishâ€“Dutch Platform of plant-based medicines. M.S. is a Scholarship holder of the Polish Minister of Science and Higher Education for Outstanding Young Scientists 2020.
